format: html

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
sleep <- read_csv("sleep.csv")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
glimpse(sleep)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

graph <- ggplot(data = sleep, 
       mapping = aes(x = `Physical Activity Level`, y = `Sleep Duration`, colour = Occupation)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(title = "Physical Activity Level and Sleep Duration for Different Occupations", caption = "Source: Kaggle")

graph_interactive <- ggplotly(graph)
graph_interactive
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

graphh <- ggplot(data = sleep, 
       mapping = aes(x = `Physical Activity Level`, y = `Sleep Duration`, colour = Occupation)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(title = "Physical Activity Level and Sleep Duration for Different Occupations (Visual #2)", caption = "Source: Kaggle") + facet_wrap(. ~ Occupation, ncol = 3)

graphh_interactive <- ggplotly(graphh)
graphh_interactive
```
